genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Rapid, reversible activation of AgRP neurons drives feeding behavior in mice.
genbank:Reference.genbank:label: 1 (bases 1 to 7315)

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Rapid, reversible activation of AgRP neurons drives feeding behavior in mice. Krashes MJ, Koda S, Ye C, Rogan SC, Adams AC, Cusher DS, Maratos-Flier E, Roth BL, Lowell BB. J Clin Invest. 2011 Apr;121(4):1424-8. doi: 10.1172/JCI46229. 10.1172/JCI46229 PubMed 21364278

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-hSyn-DIO-hM3D(Gq)-mCherry was a gift from Bryan Roth (Addgene plasmid # 44361 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:44361 ; RRID:Addgene_44361) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 44361) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAV1), (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAV2), (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAV5), (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAV8), (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAV9), (Addgene viral prep # 44361-AAVrg), or (Addgene viral prep # 44361-PHPeB)
